title: Faith
description: Faith is the substance of things hoped for.

title: Charity
description: Charity is the pure love of Christ.

title: Peace
description: Christ gives us peace unlike the world.

title: Prayer
description: Ask, and it shall be given you.

title: Hope
description: Rejoice in hope, be patient in tribulation.

title: Forgiveness
description: Forgive, and ye shall be forgiven.

title: Service
description: When ye are in the service of your fellow beings...

title: Atonement
description: greater love hath no man than this,
